botcomponent.description:
This capability updates an existing order in the 'cr039_orders' table using a specified record's GUID and new order details. It prompts for the order to update and the fields to change, such as delivery status, expected delivery date, product name, and quantity. For cr039_deliverystatus map values to logical names using this mapping: 0: Pending
For statecode map values to logical names using this mapping: 0: Active 1: Inactive
For statuscode map values to logical names using this mapping: 1: Active 2: Inactive
For statecode map values to logical names using this mapping: 0: Active 1: Inactive
For statuscode map values to logical names using this mapping: 1: Active 2: Inactive
botcomponent.name: Update existing order details in organization orders table
